cities.name: Tokyo
cities.funFact: Tokyo's underground and train networks are extensive and super busy.

cities.name: London
cities.funFact: London is technically considered a forest, with approximately 8.4 million trees.

cities.name: Paris
cities.funFact: There are no 'STOP' signs for cars in Paris; the last one was removed in 2013.

cities.name: New York City
cities.funFact: More than 800 languages are spoken in New York City.

cities.name: Shanghai
cities.funFact: Shanghai has the world's longest metro system, spanning over 800 km.

cities.name: Rome
cities.funFact: Rome is home to the world's smallest country, Vatican City.

cities.name: Istanbul
cities.funFact: Istanbul is the only city in the world that straddles two continents: Asia and Europe.

cities.name: Sydney
cities.funFact: Sydney holds more than 100 beaches and the world's largest natural harbor.

cities.name: Rio de Janeiro
cities.funFact: Rio de Janeiro is home to the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue.

cities.name: Dubai
cities.funFact: Dubai is home to the tallest skyscraper in the world, the Burj Khalifa.

cities.name: Seoul
cities.funFact: Seoul is a global hub for tech and innovation with very fast internet speeds.

cities.name: Mexico City
cities.funFact: Mexico City is sinking at a rate of 10cm per year because it was built on a lake bed.

cities.name: Amsterdam
cities.funFact: Amsterdam has more bicycles than people.

cities.name: Cairo
cities.funFact: Cairo is home to Africa's only subway system.

cities.name: Moscow
cities.funFact: Moscow's public transportation is one of the fastest in the world.

cities.name: Berlin
cities.funFact: Berlin is nine times bigger than Paris but has a lower population density.

cities.name: Los Angeles
cities.funFact: The Hollywood Sign originally read 'HOLLYWOODLAND' when it was erected in 1923.

cities.name: Singapore
cities.funFact: Singapore is known as a city in a garden and is one of the greenest cities in the world.

cities.name: Madrid
cities.funFact: Madrid is the highest capital city in Europe.

cities.name: Toronto
cities.funFact: Toronto is considered one of the most multicultural cities in the world.

cities.name: Cape Town
cities.funFact: Cape Town is home to a colony of African penguins at Boulders Beach.

cities.name: Buenos Aires
cities.funFact: Buenos Aires has the widest avenue in the world, 9 de Julio Avenue.

cities.name: Mumbai
cities.funFact: Mumbai's local trains carry more people daily than the entire population of Finland.

cities.name: Bangkok
cities.funFact: The popular energy drink, Red Bull, was created in Bangkok.

cities.name: Athens
cities.funFact: Athens is one of the oldest named cities in the world, dating back 3,400 years.

cities.name: Prague
cities.funFact: Prague's historic center is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

cities.name: Melbourne
cities.funFact: Melbourne has the largest tram system in the world.

cities.name: Lagos
cities.funFact: Lagos is the most populous city in Africa.

cities.name: Auckland
cities.funFact: Auckland is known as the 'City of Sails' for its high boat ownership.

cities.name: Santiago
cities.funFact: Santiago is surrounded by the Andes mountains, visible from most of the city.

cities.name: McMurdo Station
cities.funFact: McMurdo Station is the largest research station in Antarctica.

cities.name: Esperanza Base
cities.funFact: The first human birth in Antarctica occurred at Esperanza Base in 1978.

cities.name: Vancouver
cities.funFact: Vancouver is consistently ranked as one of the most livable cities in the world.

cities.name: Chicago
cities.funFact: The Chicago River is the only river in the world that flows backward.

cities.name: Vienna
cities.funFact: Vienna is known as the 'City of Music' due to its musical legacy.

cities.name: Brussels
cities.funFact: Brussels is the administrative center of the European Union.

cities.name: Lisbon
cities.funFact: Lisbon is the second oldest European capital after Athens.

cities.name: Dubai
cities.funFact: The Burj Khalifa in Dubai is the world's tallest building.

cities.name: Kuala Lumpur
cities.funFact: Kuala Lumpur is home to the Petronas Twin Towers, once the world's tallest.

cities.name: Nairobi
cities.funFact: Nairobi is known as the 'Green City in the Sun' and has a national park within its borders.

cities.name: Marrakech
cities.funFact: Marrakech's historic Medina is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

cities.name: Havana
cities.funFact: Havana is famous for its classic American cars and Spanish colonial architecture.

cities.name: Lima
cities.funFact: Lima is the only South American capital to face the sea.

cities.name: Manila
cities.funFact: Manila is one of the most densely populated cities in the world.

cities.name: Bangkok
cities.funFact: Bangkok's ceremonial name is one of the longest in the world.

cities.name: San Francisco
cities.funFact: The Golden Gate Bridge was not originally planned to be 'International Orange'.

cities.name: Edinburgh
cities.funFact: Edinburgh was the first city in the world to have its own fire brigade.

cities.name: Copenhagen
cities.funFact: Copenhagen is often ranked as one of the happiest cities in the world.

cities.name: Stockholm
cities.funFact: Stockholm is built on 14 islands connected by 57 bridges.

cities.name: Budapest
cities.funFact: Budapest has the oldest electrified underground railway system in continental Europe.
